message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
You're starting too high, I'll take a bigger share now
Meet me in the middle. This is a fair split.
You're still too generous, I want more
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still need to keep some for myself.
I'm getting greedy, take it or leave it
I'm not going to give you the majority, but I'm willing to compromise.
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control
I'm not going to give up yet. This is my last reasonable offer.
You're running out of time, I'm taking it all
This is my last chance to get something. Take it or leave it.
You're out of options, I'm taking it all
